channel.title: Comments on: BF5 MEDICS BE LIKE:
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: NineTales_Fox
item.dc:creator: NineTales_Fox
item.description:
I think it depends on the region as well. I find on Japanese and Singapore servers people will go out of their way to revive you, even if it's out on the open but on Australia servers it's a different story.
Also people need to realize that it takes you out of the game for 4-8 seconds and that if you're wide open to be shot, I will not revive you.
item.content:encoded:
I think it depends on the region as well. I find on Japanese and Singapore servers people will go out of their way to revive you, even if it’s out on the open but on Australia servers it’s a different story.

Also people need to realize that it takes you out of the game for 4-8 seconds and that if you’re wide open to be shot, I will not revive you.

item.title: By: SillySinStorm
item.dc:creator: SillySinStorm
item.description: Not all medics OP. Just like not all pilots/tankers are KD padders who are shit as infantry.
item.content:encoded: Not all medics OP. Just like not all pilots/tankers are KD padders who are shit as infantry.
